mapper.update:
update message
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkboy = #{checkboy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mess = #{mess,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
apply = #{apply,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update message set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkboy = #{checkboy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mess = #{mess,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, apply = #{apply,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update message set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkboy = #{checkboy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into message (Mid, Mname, Mtime, Mflag, Mtitle, Mcheckboy, Mess, Mapply) values (#{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcheckboy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mess,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{mapply,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
